description:
Go further in merino, go even further in Roam Cargo. This lightweight riding jersey has all the benefits of Merino Shift plus a three-compartment storage pocket to stash riding essentials and snacks.

Naturally odour-resistant, breathable, fast-wicking and temperature regulating, Merino-Shift fabric combines sustainability with performance to bring you a riding jersey that will adapt to all conditions, year-round.
name: Mons Royale Roam Cargo Merino Shift Full Zip LS - Mens

specs.value: Merino Shift - 52% Merino Wool, 35% Recycled Polyester, 13% Nylon - 140gsm
